mdRecord.dcterms:title: Medicine chest
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes 17 medicine bottles with stoppers: 1 without label, 16 with labels (prepared jamaica ginger, paregoric, sweet spirit of nitre, wine ipicach, tartaric acid, carbonate o[ ], diarrhea or bowel complaint mixture, tincture of rhubarb, spt. of sal volatile, turkey rhubarb, wine iprvsv, tincture of arnica, poison bi-chloride of mercury, antibilious pills, cough pills, rhubarb pills); medicine (ointment) bottle without stopper; cautery iron (?); 2 spatulas; apothecary scale; apothecary scale weight box; 2 apothecary scale weights; 4 Stedman's teething powder packets; paper packet for baby diarrhea; 2 additional paper packets; lice comb; paper with handwritten glossary; paper packet, for headache; paper packet, for sleep; paper with handwritten prescription.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical bottles
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
